creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: small teapot (a) with arched twisted handle; lid (b) with ring of four sculptural birds and square knob in center; small flared handle on one side and short spout on the other; thin white glaze over relief carving decoration on body of teapot
markings: gold foil sticker on bottom: Collectie / J.W.N.v. Achterbergh / Amstelveen; round white sticker inside lid: IG / 233
title: Teapot
